mapper.select: select q3.Zj_Name,Amt_Com,Amt_Rate_Target,Amt_UnCom,Amt_Rate from (select p3.Zj_Abbr_Name Zj_Name ,nvl(Amt_Com,0) Amt_Com,p4.ZJ_WYJ Amt_Rate_Target ,p4.ZJ_WYJ-nvl(Amt_Com,0) Amt_UnCom,nvl(Amt_Com,0)*-1/p4.ZJ_WYJ Amt_Rate from ( select B.ZJ as Zj_Name , sum(a.val) Amt_Com from XFY_RPT_WYJJM_DETAIL a left JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY b ON A.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME where cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and cpl_dt <= #{endDate} group by B.ZJ)P right join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR p3 on p.Zj_Name=p3.Zj_Abbr_Name LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET P4 ON P4.Zj_Abbr_Name=P3.Zj_Abbr_Name order by p3.Zj_Abbr_Name desc) q3 union all select Q.Zj_Name Zj_Name ,nvl(Q.Amt_Com,0) Amt_Com,Q.ZJ_WYJ Amt_Rate_Target ,Q.ZJ_WYJ-nvl(Amt_Com,0) Amt_UnCom,nvl(Q.Amt_Com,0)*-1/Q.ZJ_WYJ from ( select z1.*,p4.ZJ_WYJ from( select '合计' as Zj_Name , sum(a.val) Amt_Com from XFY_RPT_WYJJM_DETAIL a where cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and cpl_dt <= #{endDate} ) z1 LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET P4 ON P4.Zj_Abbr_Name=z1.Zj_Name ) Q

SELECT C.ZJ AS ZJ_AREA_NAME , b.ASSET_ROW_ID,b.ASSET_INTEG_ID,b.PRD_NAME,b.HM,b.STAT_NAME,b.SERV_START_DT, b.SERV_END_DT,b.FJ_NAME,b.FJ_NAME,b.ZJ_AREA_NAME,b.ORDER_ID,b.CPL_DT,b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID,b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,b.SALES_EMPLOYEE_ID, b.SALES_EMPLOYEE_NAME,b.SALES_DEPT_NAME,b.YYT_FJ,b.YYT_ZJ,b.VAL_TYPE_NAME,b.VAL FROM XFY_RPT_WYJJM_DETAIL b LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY c ON B.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=c.MKT_NAME where b.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and b.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and C.ZJ in ( select D.zj_new from XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D where d.zj_old = #{zj_name} )
